body_html:
This could potentially lead to an error (e.g. if someone smuggled a -2 into the row_shape tensor via a placeholder). Could you replace this with something like:

PartialTensorShape row_shape;
OP_REQUIRES_OK(ctx, PartialTensorShape::MakePartialShape(row_shape_t->vec<int64>().data(), row_shape_t->NumElements(), &row_shape));

...and add a test where the row_shape gets an invalid value (e.g. via a placeholder)?
